title: New insight into use of cell replacement therapies to treat muscular dystrophies

title_detail.value: New insight into use of cell replacement therapies to treat muscular dystrophies

summary: The University of Minnesota Medical School continues its legacy of advancing cell replacement therapies with a scientific breakthrough that highlights the promise of cell therapies for muscular dystrophy.

summary_detail.value: The University of Minnesota Medical School continues its legacy of advancing cell replacement therapies with a scientific breakthrough that highlights the promise of cell therapies for muscular dystrophy.
